p: Aqueous extract of M. foetida has anti-oxidant activity due to high content in phenolic and flavonoid compounds ( Acquaviva et al., 2013). Oxidative stress is closely related with Alzheimer and Parkinson diseases, diabetes, rheumatoid arthritis, and several diseases. The use of anti-oxidants in pharmacology has been instrumental in treatments of stroke and neurodegenerative diseases ( Jabeen and Khanum, 2017).
